name: Hirougana!
description:
HIROUGANA!

Hirougana! is a little simple game in development to learn the basic Hiragana alphabet.

For now, this is the very first version of the game, but I will be updating it, fixing errors and adding more options!

I have to note that I'm learning Hiragana while making this game, so if you find any mistakes, please, let me know.

Controls: Directional arrows (←) & (→) to move around the options. Enter & Upper directional arrow (↑) to select option (Only In-Game). "R", "N", & "D" are debug option keys, so they might help you if you're searching for errors. (Restart, New set of questions & Answer)

Enjoy it :]

-TheHirou
